paper_abstract: In this paper we consider the q-extension of Bernstein numbers and polynomials which are slightly different Carlitz's q-Bernstein numbers and polynomials. From those q-Bernoulli numbers and polynomials, we derive same interesting identities between q-Bernoulli numbers and q-Bernstein polynomials.
paper_title: A NOTE ON THE q-BERNOULLI NUMBERS AND q-BERNSTEIN POLYNOMIALS
